title: BRIEF-Conn's Says CEO Norman Miller's 2018 Total Compensation Was $10.3 Mln Which Includes Stock Awards Of $7.6 Mln
text:
Market News April 20, 2018 / 10:28 AM / Updated 5 minutes ago BRIEF-Conn's Says CEO Norman Miller's 2018 Total Compensation Was $10.3 Mln Which Includes Stock Awards Of $7.6 Mln Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 20 (Reuters) - Conn’s Inc: 
* CONN'S INC SAYS CEO NORMAN L. MILLER'S 2018 TOTAL COMPENSATION WAS $10.3 MILLION WHICH INCLUDES STOCK AWARDS OF $7.6 MILLION – SEC FILING Source text: ( bit.ly/2HNnB2q ) Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
